product_name: Rossignol Evo OT Cross-Country Skis with NIS Bindings
long_description: The Rossignol Evo OT (Off Trail) cross-country skis with NIS bindings feature wide dimensions and partial metal edges to increase off-trail versatility. They're lightweight and maneuverable, too. Waxless Positrack bases have a positive (raised pattern) kick surface for maximum grip and deliver the best compromise between grip and glide in all snow conditions. Skis include NIS T4 Auto bindings: easy hands-free click-in/click-out design provides fast, user-friendly entry and exit; wide heel pieces increase stability. Wood cores with large air channels provides lightweight, durable performance; partial metal edges dig in for easier turning and control. Durable Active Cap construction, with slightly widened edges, increases torsional stability and offers a supple longitudinal flex. Shorter-than-tradtional ski length increases maneuverability, predictability and control while climbing, descending and cruising the flats. Stone finished bases on the Rossignol Evo OT skis optimize the glide phase.
